# This test is to draw Pikachu using the methods provided, mainly a fill_polygon test
# I tried to test as many cases of fill polygon as I could while sticking to the 90 degree angles required to draw the sprite.
INIT 200 200

# BACKGROUND
FILL_POLYGON 0 0 199 0 199 199 0 199 (118,192,126,255)
## PIKACHU ##
